headline: Franklin Templeton Announces Plan to Liquidate Franklin Sustainable International Equity ETF
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., September 08, 2025--Franklin Templeton today announced it will liquidate and dissolve Franklin Sustainable International Equity ETF (MCSE). The liquidation is anticipated to occur on or about January 16, 2026.

headline: Franklin's August AUM Rises on Market Gains Despite Outflows
summary: BEN's AUM climbed to $1.64T in August, lifted by market gains despite $3B in long-term net outflows.

raw.headline: Franklin's August AUM Rises on Market Gains Despite Outflows
raw.summary: BEN's AUM climbed to $1.64T in August, lifted by market gains despite $3B in long-term net outflows.

headline: Franklin Templeton Names Daniel Gamba Chief Commercial Officer
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., September 08, 2025--Franklin Resources, Inc. (Franklin Templeton; NYSE:BEN) today announced the appointment of Daniel Gamba as Chief Commercial Officer, overseeing global sales, marketing and product strategy, effective October 15, 2025. Gamba will report to Jenny Johnson, Chief Executive Officer of Franklin Templeton, and join the company’s Executive Committee. He will be based in New York City.
